description: room with bed in LLC; photos on wall at right; framed photos, clock and Pillsbury Dough Boy figure on heater and window ledge at center; shadowy figure seated at computer desk at left

title: Self-portrait at Computer, Thursday, January 16, 2003, 6-7pm
